body.title: Project Description
body.text:
For this project, we had to create a game inspired by Cook Serve Delicious. This project was completed in my first year at Epitech using the CSFML library.

Our main challenge for this game was to create a user-friendly interface and smooth menus. The game had to adhere to the following rules:

  • The player is a chef in a restaurant
  • Orders will appear randomly to the player
  • Orders will have a time limit for completion
  • Orders will be of different types
  • The player must select the correct ingredients in the correct order
  • Having a user-friendly interface is one of the details that make a game of good quality

body.title: Our My Cook
body.text:
Our game called The Cosmic Burger is a burger restaurant in space. The player will create a burger by adding ingredients in the correct order using the keyboard. The goal is to achieve the highest score possible (satisfaction rate * money).
Each well-made burger increases satisfaction and revenue, but each ingredient addition decreases the money of the game.

Our interface allows to:

  • See the menu with 4 possible burgers: Supreme, Classic, Vegetarian and Cosmic Burger
  • Serve the burger or put it in the trash
  • Visualize the score and money of the game as well as the different possible ingredients
  • See the customers orders with a timer to serve them


The game has a dynamic menu with a tutorial and settings.
